description:
Happy Monday! 

This week's episode is full of laughter, great conversation and electric energy after watching this year’s Grammy Awards. Hosts Bridget Kelly and Mandii B have some grown (9:00), honest (32:00), and slightly toxic conversation (1:12:00) joined with hilarious friends with benefits and digital creator Tefi. 

The three discuss: the outfits at the Grammys (9:00)Harry Styles winning album of the year and the reaction from the audience ((30:00)Chris Brown’s snub towards Robert Glasper (44:00)Allegations about Quavo & Offset engaging in a physical altercation backstage (54:00)Hip Hop’s 50th anniversary and the exclusion of iconic music from the south during the performance (1:00:00)The new generation of celebrity culture (1:11:00)Lil Jon’s lawsuit against Live Nation over the Lovers & Friends Festival(1:14:00) and so much more!!! You’ll definitely want to stick around towards the end when the ladies discuss a lawsuit forcing them to ask “Does it require both parties to consider something a"date " and "should you be allowed to sue someone for wasting your time (1:22:00)?

We end the episode with our new music selections during our music segment: Freshly squeezed (1:32:00)

—----------------
